title: Copper oxide nanoparticles induce cuproptosis and ferroptosis through mitochondrial concatenation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00455H, Paper
Muran Jiang, Xiaoqi Tao, Yingxin Pang, Zongmin Qin, Erqun Song, Yang Song
Copper oxide nanoparticles (CuO NPs) will accumulate in soil and water due to human and natural activities, eventually finding their way into the human body through direct or indirect pathways....
